fields.title: Your auth token
fields.description:
You will need an Auth token. If you have not received an auth token yet, send us an email to [community@dappnode.io](mailto:community@dappnode.io?subject=Authtoken%20Request&body=I%20would%20like%20to%20receive%20an%20Auth%20token%20for%20my%20DAppNode%20Storj%20Package)

It should look like this:

```
nodler@dappnode.io:1DuEZCeRidy8W8ey8Lwy8VMXWYVdmehVZUQjve8u8HsndgxYKgUzNnnfkUGZP88tJTzvFSyXvFTpKRhHSpZFLz1TcU8bBg
```

fields.title: Your wallet
fields.description:
An Ethereum wallet address where you will receive STORJ token payouts for running the node.

If you don't have an Ethereum address, learn [how to obtain a valid payout address](https://support.storj.io/hc/en-us/articles/360026611692-How-do-I-hold-STORJ-What-is-a-valid-address-or-compatible-wallet-).

 ⚠️**Warning: an exchange address is not a valid address**⚠️

fields.title: Your allocate bandwidth
fields.description:
How much bandwidth you can allocate for the Storj network to use. 

Be sure to leave enough bandwidth for other use cases you have for your internet connection and do not allocate more than your ISP supplied up and/or what your download speed can physically supply. To calculate the maximum monthly BANDWIDTH you can follow instructions [here](https://support.storj.io/hc/en-us/articles/360026893111-How-do-I-calculate-my-Total-monthly-bandwidth-from-my-Mbit-s-up-and-download-speed-). The minimum bandwidth requirement is 2TB.
fields.patternErrorMessage: The bandwidth needs to be in the form: `xTB` (without spaces), where the x is the number of Terabytes allocate

fields.title: Storage space
fields.description:
How much disk space you want to allocate to the Storj network.

Be sure not to over-allocate space! Allow at least 10% extra for overhead. If you over-allocate space, you may corrupt your database when the system attempts to store pieces when no more physical space is actually available on your drive. The minimum storage shared requirement is 500 GB, which means you need a disk with at least 550 GB free to allow for the 10% overhead.
fields.patternErrorMessage: The storage space needs to be in the form: `xTB` (without spaces), where the x is the number of Terabytes allocate

fields.title: Storage data mountpoint
fields.description: Use this option if you want to store the Storage data in a separate drive. Make sure to have sufficient free space according to the Storage space parameter

fields.title: Your email
fields.description: Email address so that we can notify you when a new version has been released. (recommended)
fields.patternErrorMessage: Must be a valid email address
